summary: All 5 plans pass code review. 23 agent files have correct Teammate API sections with guard, reference link, and dept-appropriate schemas/targets. dept-orchestrate.sh correctly routes team_mode through build_dept_entry helper with object[] depts schema. Protocol docs (go.md, execute-protocol.md, cross-team-protocol.md) expanded with full Phase 2 agent rosters. handoff-schemas.md Tester->Senior fix applied (C3). ROADMAP.md criteria corrected (C2). 27 new tests (8 static + 9 unit + 10 integration) all GREEN. Full regression 932 tests, 0 failures. TDD RED phase commit cb3d662 precedes GREEN implementation for 02-02 T3 (12 tests). One justified deviation in 02-04 T1: spec said owner excluded from @reference check, but 02-02 T2 spec included the @reference in owner -- Dev resolved correctly by checking all 23.

desc: Communication section (line 64) duplicates Teammate API section content (SendMessage test_plan_result to Senior). Not a bug -- the Communication section was pre-existing and the Teammate API section is the canonical reference -- but creates mild redundancy.
fix: No action needed. The Communication section serves as a quick summary for non-teammate mode readers.

desc: Test 5 title says 'all 23 agents reference @references/teammate-api-patterns.md' but spec originally said 22 (owner excluded). Dev documented deviation in summary -- correct resolution but title could note the deviation was intentional.
fix: No action needed. Deviation is documented in 02-04.summary.jsonl dv field.
